short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: [DEPRECATED] Automatically identify your visitors on any web page and watch recording sessions of them using your site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
[DEPRECATED] Automatically identify your visitors on any web page and watch recording sessions of them using your site. The Crazy Egg Chrome extension allows you to:

- Watch specific visitors use your website and see where they're having trouble

- Get to the heart of your customer support queries in no time

- View your visitor journey across multiple visits to get a better understanding of your visitor behavior

- Integrates with your customer support and sales platforms, such as Salesforce, Zendesk or Helpscout
